titles.title: Prescription Privacy Protection Act of 2006
To amend title XI of the Social Security Act to protect the privacy of drug prescriber information.

bill.summary: 7/27/2006--Introduced. Prescription Privacy Protection Act of 2006 - Amends title XI of the Social Security Act to prohibit a drug manufacturer from, directly or indirectly, using prescriber identifiable health information for commercial purposes. Establishes a penalty for violation of such prohibition.
